glsa.title: GTetrinet: Remote code execution
glsa.synopsis: GTetrinet is vulnerable to a remote buffer overflow, potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.

background.p: GTetrinet is a networked Tetris clone for GNOME 2.

description.p: Michael Gehring has found that GTetrinet fails to properly handle array indexes.

impact.p: An attacker can potentially execute arbitrary code by sending a negative number of players to the server.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GTetrinet users should upgrade to the latest version:
